Author: Markos-PylonNetwork
Title: [ANN][ICO] Pylon Network - Decentralized energy exchange platform
Body: Hi,  Your skepticism is very valid, since the energy sector is very much regulated/controlled and disruption takes time, since we are talking about ownership and technical restrictions of physical generation assets, networks/grids etc.  Pylon Network is implemented in partnership with renewable energy cooperatives in Spain and Europe. As electricity suppliers to their members/customers, energy cooperatives becomes our first link to the European energy market and the European electricity consumer.  However, Pylon Network is designed as an open-source tool for cooperation between all players of the energy market. This means that once our platform is demonstrated in partnership with energy cooperatives in Europe (our demonstration partners are GoiEner from the Basque country in Spain) any player who wishes, will be able to integrate their operation on Pylon Network, potentially with no cost.  By taking out the commercial exploitation from the core operation of the platform and adding all benefits of blockchain (trust, transparency, traceability) is how Pylon Network aims to expand to more players who want (or are committed/obliged) to make their operation more efficient and green.  Necessary condition for a future adoption by many players/markets is the demonstration of the benefits  of our blockchain algorithm (i.e. scalability potential & green mining consumption), which we will validate through the later stages of Pylon demonstration.  It won't happen within a day. It is a long process and has been longer than it should. Our only aim is to accelerate it and the more the better.. Author: PROSUME - Giacomo Beretta
Title: [ANN][ICO] Pylon Network - Decentralized energy exchange platform
Body: The guys working with Utilities already are the ones from the PROSUME.io ICO. They already have projects running ion building microcommunities with various European Utilities as well as a large project with a Transmission System Operator.  The problems with peer to peer transactions energy transactions are of two main origins. 1. legal limitations for a non utility related energy producer to sell against value to another common citizen 2. transmission and distribution costs to be paid to the Grid Operator.  Prosume has solved both these points in order to build a very strong business case from day one.

Author: Markos-PylonNetwork
Title: [ANN][ICO] Pylon Network - Decentralized energy exchange platform
Body: Pylon Network is implemented within the operational scope of renewable energy cooperatives - we start with a demonstration project within the electricity grid of Spain, in partnership with the energy cooperative GoiEner. The pilot project will be funded by the ICO which is currently live.  We have partnered up with GoiEner - an energy cooperative from the Basque country with 8,000 members - and we are in talks with numerous others around Europe. Energy cooperatives are well-defined players of the enegy market (especially in Europe - 650k members and growing) and through them we access the market and we bring consumers together with producers of solar energy of all scales (from prosumers in households to large scale solar PV).  At the same time, Pylon Network is open for everyone to implement a model for trading electricity built around Pylon Coin - including utilities. However, at the moment we are focusing on the demonstration of our platform within the real market, together with our partners. Among our partners are Faircoop: a team of experienced blockchain code developers that have developed their own "Proof-of-Cooperation" consesus. Together we are developing Pylon Coin code which is based on Proof of Cooperation and minimizes the energy footprint of the platform.  In few words, Pylon Network offers the most realistic implementation plan and a very strong team of developers, engineers, advisors and partners.

Author: Markos-PylonNetwork
Title: [ANN][ICO] Pylon Network - Decentralized energy exchange platform
Body: Hi Giacomo,  Thanks for promoting your ICO in our thread! The project seems interesting however, Pylon Network offers much more than a P-2-P platform for electricity exchange. Pylon Network provides the framework for the creation of a self-governed energy-based economy, built around renewable energy.  At the same time, we have solved both of the problems you are mentioning and our model is applicable in the rest of EU, not only on one country. Our platform is not restricted to exclusive use and is open to all energy cooperatives who want to adopt it to their specific needs.  Again, thanks for your comment and good luck with your project!  Cheers!

Title: [ANN][ICO] Pylon Network - Decentralized energy exchange platform
Body: Press Release: GreenPeace sees Pylon Network as a tool to democratize green energy.  Link press release: https://pylon-network.org/press-release-greenpeace-sees-pylon-network-tool-democratize-green-energy.html  15/09/2017 Benicarl√≥, Spain.  This week we visited Madrid to spread the word about Pylon Network and explore possibilities for collaboration with other innovators focusing on social impact! On Tuesday 12 morning, we paid a visit at Greenpeace Spain headquarters (Madrid). There, we had the chance to have a very interesting discussion with Sara Pizzinato, responsible for the promotion of renewable energy at Greenpeace, who explained us how Greenpeace is looking to promote renewable energy in ways that maximize social value creation. Of course, we had the chance to‚Ä¶mention Pylon Network and engage to a dialogue for exploring future collaborations and demonstration of the blockchain technology as a tool for energy democratization.  It also, ‚Äúhappened‚Äù that Greenpeace was organizing the same day a conference with all Spanish energy cooperatives invited. And it happened that we mentioned Pylon to them, too‚Ä¶  We are very fond of the cooperative model and we want Pylon to be an open environment and a scalable tool to accommodate all cooperatives who want to empower communities through democratization of green energy assets and decision-making about such a basic commodity as energy, at local level.  It is clear that there is a great interest in the advantages that blockchain technology can offer and Klenergy will keep pursuing open dialogue with all co-minded stakeholders in order to demonstrate the Pylon Network model ‚Äì and the underlying blockchain technology ‚Äì at market-scale while re-shaping the operational model of the current energy system. Title: [ANN][ICO] Pylon Network - Decentralized energy exchange platform
Body: Pylon Network is structured with only one purpose: to create the first open, renewable energy exchange community, which will provide the energy markets with the signals and financial incentives that current energy policies and governance systems, are failing, or delaying to provide.  Users of Pylon can exchange green energy, bought directly from the RES producer and without need for intervention of intermediaries throughout the process, while Pylon-coin is utilized to reward the production of sustainable energy and financially support projects on sustainable technologies.  Pylon Network is a decentralized platform promoting decentralized energy technologies. Its operation is based on blockchain technology which gives the room for creation of trust mechanisms and data management at a decentralized scale.  By integrating our blockchain smart meter, Klenergy Metron, in the operation of Pylon Network and assigning them the role of validating all energy and currency transactions within the platform, it is possible to: Reward the production of green energy Connect grid-connected players (producers, consumers & prosumers) with stand-alone RES2 installations.  This is the information you can find just by going to our website: www.pylon-network.org  Could you tell us why you say it's a copy of SunContract? Body: Klenergy chosen as one of the 100 startups finalists of South Summit 2017    Web: Pylon-Network.org Twitter: https://twitter.com/KlenergyTech Telegram Official Channel (English):  https://t.me/pylonnetworkofficialtelegram Telegram Spanish Channel (Espa√±ol): https://t.me/pylonnetworkspanishchannel Bitcointalk channel (English): https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2054297 Bitcointalk Channel (Espa√±ol) : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2055169  KLENERGY: http://klenergy-tech.com/ Klenergy Metron: http://metron.es/  Klenergy is a startup focused on Energy De-centralisation, Energy Storage and Energy Efficiency. Committees of experts formed by corporations and investors have chosen Klenergy amongst the 100 startups from more than 3,500 projects submitted from more than 70 countries. The finalists will participate along with the rest of the actors of the entrepreneurial ecosystem in the meeting, to be held in the Madrid area of La N @vefrom 4 to 6 October. The winner will compete for $ 1M in funding in the Silicon Valley Startup World Cup, as well as access to a funding campaign led bySeedrs, the global equity crowdfunding platform.    Press Release:  Madrid, July 19, 2017  South Summit already has its 100 startups finalists for its next edition. More than 90 experts have selected the 100 projects that will participate in the international meeting of the entrepreneurial ecosystem, to be held in Madrid from 4 to 6 October in the Madrid area of La N @ VE and will bring together the most important actors of the entrepreneurial ecosystem : Investors, startups and corporations.  Klenergy and Pylon Network  Among the selected startups is Klenergy, which works on The Pylon Network. Its CEO and founder, Gerard Bel, explains: "Pylon Network is a Peer-to-Peer (P2P) energy exchange platform based on blockchain technology. All transactions occur without intermediaries and with the use of Pylon-Coin, which is used to pay for the energy exchanged through Pylon Network. It was designed specifically, to reward the production of Renewable Energy (RE) in order to accelerate their implementation in a de-centralised framework by making RE investments more attractive. Pylon Network is an ambitious, yet feasible project, which we are here to demonstrate the value creation from decentralization of energy generation, within the Spanish energy market. This will be the first implementation of blockchain technology in the energy sector, at such a large scale ‚Äì 800 people are going to participate in the pilot demonstration stage. It is definitely the most innovative and large-scale project for Europe and maybe, even globally".  South Summit Startup Competition  Among the criteria that have been taken into account for the selection of the hundred projects, five fundamental values stand out:  The innovation they bring to the market, Their economic viability, The scalability of their technology, The human team behind them Thether they are scalable or not.  Selected from a total of 3,500 projects - 53% international from more than 72 countries - the 100 startups selected come from countries like the United States, Israel, United Kingdom, France, Germany, Portugal, Italy, Mexico or Chile. At a Spanish national level they come from the Community of Madrid, Catalonia, Valencian Community, Andalusia, Galicia, Asturias, Castile and Leon, Basque Country and Navarre.  The selected projects correspond to innovative and disruptive initiatives of the main industries: Smart Mobility, Travel & Tourism, New Money, Content & Channels, Healthcare & Biotech, Lifestyle & Fashion, Energy & Sustainability, Art & Culture, as well as initiatives related to B2B and B2C. Regarding the level of development, 31% of projects already have a consolidated project in the growth phase.  In addition to participating in South Summit 2017, all selected startups will have access to training, one-to-one meetings, mentoring and a space of their own in the meeting next October. This will allow them to gain great visibility, access new business opportunities and publicize their projects to investors and corporations in search of innovation, from around the world.  As a novelty in this edition, the winning startup will compete for $ 1 million in funding at the Silicon Valley Startup World Cup and will feature a funding campaign led by Seedrs - the leading global equity crowdfunding platform.  So far, the initiatives selected in previous editions of this meeting - among which Carto, Cabify, Spotahome and Habitissimo stand out - have managed to raise more than one trillion dollars of investment, as well as different strategic agreements on innovation with numerous corporations.
